Class.name: RG.ESB.Generated.SAPOperation
Class.Description: Java Business Operation which runs Java class ru.intersystems.SAPOperation

Property.name: Address
Property.Description: IP address or name of the machine where the Java Gateway Server is located.

Property.name: IRISHost
Property.Description: IRISHost property used by the Java class

Property.name: IRISNamespace
Property.Description: IRISNamespace property used by the Java class

Property.name: IRISPassword
Property.Description: IRISPassword property used by the Java class

Property.name: IRISPort
Property.Description: IRISPort property used by the Java class

Property.name: IRISUsername
Property.Description: IRISUsername property used by the Java class

Property.name: JCoDestinationsDir
Property.Description: JCoDestinationsDir property used by the Java class

Property.name: JCoName
Property.Description: JCoName property used by the Java class

Property.name: JarFile
Property.Description: Path to JAR file containing Java-side implementation of this Business Operation

Property.name: JavaGatewayService
Property.Description: Name of the Config Item for the Java Gateway Server. If specified, the Address and Port of the selected Java Gateway Server override any values entered in the Address and Port settings.

Property.name: LogFileName
Property.Description: LogFileName property used by the Java class

Property.name: Port
Property.Description: TCP port number for communication between the Java Gateway Server and the proxy classes in IRIS.
